LandingPage.Hero-Description: warmwind is your all in one solution, when it comes to AI employees. No more tool chaos - everything in the cloud.

Walkthrough.Title: The first cloud employee
Walkthrough.Description: Uses all your apps for you.
Walkthrough.Step1: First you create your personal workspace.
Walkthrough.Step2: Then, install your apps from our App Store.
Walkthrough.Step3: And finally - tell your assistant to run the show.

Quote.Paragraph-1: warmwind OS is the world’s first AI-native operating system built to unify, simplify, and humanize the age of artificial intelligence.
Quote.Paragraph-2: We are ending the chaos of thousands of fragmented AI tools and replacing it with one intuitive system that empowers individuals and businesses to harness the full potential of artificial intelligence. By letting AI act independently across apps, platforms, and devices through a visually explorable environment, warmwind OS becomes the new operating layer for future humanity - transparent, powerful, and personal.
Quote.Paragraph-3: Our mission is to make advanced AI feel like magic, but work like infrastructure: invisible when you want it, indispensable when you need it.

SocialMedia.Title: Social Media Growth Manager
SocialMedia.Description: warmwind independently scans current trends, automatically creates posts including graphics and videos, schedules them optimally, and continuously analyzes their performance. Completely autonomous and active around the clock, your marketing team can focus on more strategic tasks.

CustomerSupport.Title: Customer Support
CustomerSupport.Description: warmwind handles all customer inquiries completely independently – whether via email, chat, WhatsApp, or social media. She finds order information, answers FAQs, resolves problems independently, and only delegates complex, special cases to the human team.

CompetitionMonitoring.Title: Proactive Competition Monitoring
CompetitionMonitoring.Description: warmwind monitors your competitors' social media accounts and automatically creates reports on their activities. This allows you to stay ahead of the curve and always be one step ahead of your competitors.

Accounting.Title: Accounting & Invoice Management
Accounting.Description: warmwind automatically recognizes invoices, extracts data, reconciles them with purchase orders, logs transactions, and independently reminds you of payments. Monthly financial statements are ready for management – ​​completely without manual intervention.

Recruiting.Title: Recruiting Assistant
Recruiting.Description: warmwind independently screens applications, checks CVs and social media profiles, conducts initial interviews via video chat, and automatically evaluates candidates. The HR team receives only a top selection of the most qualified applicants.

WebsiteMonitoring.Title: Website and Product Monitoring
WebsiteMonitoring.Description: warmwind continuously monitors the health of your website, analyzes visitor flows, detects errors, downtimes, and issues, and automatically reports anomalies to developers, ensuring a consistently optimal user experience.

InnovationScout.Title: Innovation Scout
InnovationScout.Description: Every day, warmwind scours the web for innovative technologies, relevant startups, market trends, and inspiring best practices. An automatically generated innovation report is available every morning just in time for breakfast – perfect for strategic decision-making.

Scaling.Title: Designed for 1, ready for 1000
Scaling.Description: Set up one workspace. Then ten. Then 1000. warmwind lets you start small and scale fast - from simple workflows to full-on company-wide automation.

List.Item-1: Can see and interact with actual applications
List.Item-2: You don’t need to be a developer

SectionCareers.Title: Start a career at warmwind
SectionCareers.Description: Excited to shape the future of AI? Become part of our team. We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

SectionGetStarted.Subtitle: Quickly learn how to setup your first workspace and start automating.
